entities.name: auntie muriel
entities.description: Auntie Muriel is a person who is described as having surprising strength and being able to swing around a chair with ease. She is also mentioned as being interested in reading Rita Skeeter's biography of Dumbledore.

entities.name: doge
entities.description: Doge is a person who is described as looking stiff and solemn when Auntie Muriel mentions rumors about Albus Dumbledore. He also turns radish-colored again after speaking up.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is a person who has written a biography of Dumbledore, which Auntie Muriel is interested in reading.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is a person about whom there were some funny rumors before he became respected and respectable. He is also the subject of Rita Skeeter's biography.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is addressed by Auntie Muriel as 'Barry' or whatever his name is.

entities.name: barry
entities.description: Barry is a person whose name is used by Auntie Muriel to address Harry.

entities.name: flourish and blotts
entities.description: Flourish and Blotts is a store where Auntie Muriel plans to place an order for Rita Skeeter's biography of Dumbledore.

entities.name: goblet
entities.description: A goblet is an object that Auntie Muriel drains and then clicks her bony fingers at a passing waiter to replace.

relationships.description: Auntie Muriel is interested in reading Rita Skeeter's biography of Dumbledore, as mentioned by her saying 'I must remember to place an order at Flourish and Blotts!'
Albus Dumbledore is the subject of Rita Skeeter's biography, which Auntie Muriel is interested in reading.
Rita Skeeter has written a biography of Albus Dumbledore.
